name: SCP - Laboratory Raid
description:
SCP inspired video game created as the final project for the Computer Graphics (TC3022) class, applying concepts like reflection probes, physics, PBR materials, shader programming, etc.

Special thanks to :
- 3DMaesen (https://sketchfab.com/bumstrum) for the 3D model and animations of the player and the weapons.
- NotARealStudio (https://sketchfab.com/NotARealStudio) for the Sci-fi Industrial Door.

DISCLAIMER:
I do not own any of the SCP material (logos, name, etc.) or the wallpaper used in the demo, I only used the concept and sprites for this nonprofit game.
